name: Flyence Aviation Academy
about: Flyence Aviation Academy, based in Greece, is the fastest-growing Approved Training Organisation in the region, backed by the European Aviation Safety Agency (EASA). The academy offers a range of courses including Modular, Integrated, Flight Instructor, and Type Rating programs, as well as license conversions and Multi-Crew Cooperation (MCC) training. Students can achieve a full Integrated Airline Transport Pilot License (ATPL) in just 17 months, thanks to Athens' favorable weather conditions. With a team of seasoned instructors and state-of-the-art facilities, including an Airbus A320 flight simulator, Flyence provides exceptional quality, personalized instruction, and efficient programs. The academy is committed to cultivating a community of future pilots with confidence and skill, ensuring each student receives the best education possible to realize their aviation dreams.
